meanings.definition: To release (something) before the official release date.
meanings.sent1: The company is prereleasing their new product to generate excitement.
meanings.sent2: They are prereleasing the movie online for a limited time.
meanings.sent3: Prereleasing the surprise party details accidentally spoiled the surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter prereleased the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The early morning sun prereleased a warm glow over the horizon.

meanings.definition: The act of releasing something before the official release date.
meanings.sent1: The prereleasing of the album caused a lot of buzz among fans.
meanings.sent2: Prereleasing can sometimes lead to leaks of sensitive information.
meanings.sent3: His constant prereleasing of secrets made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The prereleasing of emotions can be therapeutic in some cases.
meanings.sent5: The prereleasing of the balloons created a colorful spectacle in the sky.
